entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
